title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Circular Economy and Miscellaneous 
Provisions Act 2022 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) (No. 2) Order

text_raw:
2. 

In this Order, “Act of 2022” means the Circular Economy and 

Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (No. 26 of 2022).

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
heading: 3. The 29th day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
3. The 29th day of June 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following 

provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 6; 

(b) 

sections 11 to 14.
text_norm: 3 29th day june 2023 appointed day following provision act 2022 shall come operation (a) section 6 (b) section 11 14

title: (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 252 of 2023), hereby
heading: 4. The 1st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following
text_raw:
4. The 1st day of July 2023 is appointed as the day on which the following 

provisions of the Act of 2022 shall come into operation: 

(a) 

sections 5(1) and (3); 

(b) 

sections 8 and 9; 

(c) 

section 16(a); 

(d) 

section 17; 

(e) 

(f) 

(g) 

(h) 

section 22; 

sections 24 and 25; 

sections 27 to 31; 

section 33. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 4th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [344] 3 

GIVEN under my hand, 

28 June, 2023. 

OSSIAN SMYTH, 

Minister of State at the Department of the Environment, 
Climate and Communications.
